name: aws-cost-optimizer-lambdas
description: Lambda functions for AWS Cost Optimizer

scripts.install:all: for dir in auth accounts analysis reports stripe organizations; do echo "Installing $dir..."; (cd $dir && npm install); done
scripts.build:all: for dir in auth accounts analysis reports stripe organizations; do echo "Building $dir..."; (cd $dir && npm run package); done
scripts.clean:all: for dir in auth accounts analysis reports stripe organizations; do (cd $dir && npm run clean 2>/dev/null || true); done
